properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 17 at 6:06AM CST until January 17 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...Light Freezing Rain May Create Hazardous Travel Conditions
Today...

* WHAT...Freezing rain and sleet. Ice accumulations of a light
glaze.

* WHERE...Butler and Stoddard Counties.

* WHEN...Until 10 AM CST this morning.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of light sleet and freezing rain will
gradually change to rain late this morning.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible
power outages.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING
